description: Continuation of Title 24 CF-1R compliance report forms. Includes mechanical/HVAC sub-forms (CF1R-MCH-01-E), HERS verification checklist, lighting compliance data, and compliance registration information. Performance compliance method.
key_content: HERS verification items checklist present (duct leakage, refrigerant charge, airflow, fan efficacy)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: HVAC system type and efficiency ratings (SEER2, HSPF2, AFUE)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: IAQ ventilation type and CFM rate
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: duct leakage testing threshold (CFM25)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: refrigerant charge verification details
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: lighting high-efficacy specifications
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: compliance registration number
NOT SHOWN: PV solar system specifications (may be on T-1 or separate document)

drawing_zones.content: CF-1R mechanical/HVAC sub-form (CF1R-MCH-01-E) with equipment summary
Additional CF-1R compliance forms and registration data
